YOU think i care? well guess again. I dont.

important [or not so important] events this week: Monday in drama craig slammed the door so hard to ceiling fell down... and we didn't even get caught! :-) Tuesday Sophie came to school, and we went xmas shopping, and sang hohoho..im a bad MoFo too much, Thursday Last day of school, me and rachael ate all of barry's sweets, and quice was acting like a stupid quice, stupid boy. Friday Work all day, Then i went out with Jamie [hes a nice boy :-)] kurt, Tom, Domo, Mitch, And Lee, down argos for a bit, and these ghetto kids had a really old mo-ped, and fat lee crashed into the wall, haha, it was the funniest thing ever, i nearly weeed, Saturday work all day, :-( but it was okay, Amy and Kellie make me laugh, Roger was in a good mood for once, he wont be on monday tho bcus Gretchens bringing in christmas songs, which Roger "despises" haha anyway.. <3 sarah xx

i wrote you a letter last night.
but i won't ever give it you.
bcus i know its too late. 
:'(

Cut the skin to the bone Fall asleep all alone Hear your voice in the dark Lose myself in your eyes Choke my voice Say goodnight as the world falls apart Fuck I can't let this kill me, let go I need some more time to fix this Here's a letter for you But the words get confused And the conversation dies Apologize for the past Talk some shit take it back Are we cursed to this life I'm talking to the ceiling My life just lost all meaning Do one thing for me tonight I'm dying in this silence The last star left in heaven Is falling down to earth and Do you still feel the same way Do you still feel the same way?

Leigh made The Brickulator and he was two hours late for school haha.

Im at school, in the library with Liam, he keeps showing me yuckky pictures on his file, haha.
Therepy was weird, didn't cry tho which was good, i went to parents evening last night..great, what an exciting life i lead.
its getting cold outside,
and I hope it stays that way
because I love it,
and everyone always looks pretty in cold weather
even me! (sometimes)
my hairs stayed really straight today, which is always good and apparently its blonder :)
me and craig have snotty heads haha,or we feel like our brains have turned to snot..its silly.
Today should be a nice day i hope
im going into town with craig and rachael after tutorial, to buy some:
trousers [for work]
some socks
and nail varnish!
<center>work all day tomorrow...ewwww.
AND - I think I may be getting sick. double ew.</center>

thats all for now
<33

Well. The past few days have been okay i guess. I went to the hospital on Monday, which was really horrible, worse than i expected, it hurt lots :( but I don't have to go back again anytime soon. And no operation, which is always good! I'm starting to feel less depressed, im not crying anymore, crying sucks, i hate it, its just a bad habit i need to break. Anyway.. Today was okay went to rileys...still as boring as ever, i played match maker with ste and rachael, haha. and me and vickie sang loudly to annoy everyone, its all good. Nothing else to say really, quite a boring entry.
Yeah well fuck you.
I spoke the words but never gave a thought to what they all could mean. I know that this is what you want. A funeral keeps both of us apart. You know that you are not alone. Need you like water in my lungs. This is the end. meh.

Theres nothing to say, because everything that I want to say I end up deleting because it doesnt sound good enough, or sounds to pathetic. But, I'm tired of being over dramatic, and definatly tired of being 'sad'. What lonely days. I need [want] a boy to hold hands with, and pick me flowers, and draw me stupid pictures. blahblahblahblahblah. yeah.

There is a day when you wake up and notice you're not crying. Time has not healed anything, it has just made you get used to the pain
me and vicky in hmv..looking silly :) David with short hair Me and luke trying to look "shifty" outside carlos...we just look drunk. Mitch trying to be scary. Vickie me and vickie looking dopey hehe david..upclose Rachael in rileys me not looking vickie and smelly james chris in james' "game room" Last night was nice. I went to battle of the bands at the mill, I met David before and we sat in mc donalds and talked, it was nice, he was telling me about how hes gonna 'lay a beat down" on Lucy. then we met Joel, went to the mill and found Liz with a pirate obbsession =D we watched the bands, and tried to get neil to talk to this girl in a pretty dress but he "wasn't drunk enough" so i poked him, and i poked lots of other people. then i hugged dave (dgj) when he came off stage and he was really sweaty and i got his sweat on my nose lol :s :) haha love sarah xxx

And I guess tomorrow is another day, another day i'll avoid this. Theres so much that needs to be said, I dont know how to say this, because I dont know how to say much of anything anymore. I feel as if I am going to burst, but when my time comes to let everything out, it all seems so complex that I can never find the words to say it. And its always so easy to talk to other people about exactly how you feel, until it comes time to tell the one person that needs to know. And then I am always second guessing everything I feel like talking about. I dont know what to do anymore about anything. Im up and down and back up again every single day, and all I want to figure out is what to do to just be happy. Nobody can be happy all of the time, but then again, nobody should always be feeling down either. Im so fucking lazy and so careless with so many things now. I always feel as if Im making somebody unhappy, and its always hard for me to tell who does and who doesnt want me around. I'm so sorry about everything, I just wish i could say No, i don't want this to happen, but yet again, i let myself be 'lead astray'. I talked a lot about this today at therepy, i as much long for therepy as i dread going, sometimes it scares me because i have to relive things i'd never want to happen again, this which should never have happened, but i have to go through every single little detail and decipher what it mens to me, sometimes i can't move i feel so numb, but i think i'm making progress, even if it is slow.

I'm going to London tomorrow with school, im not looking forward to it anymore, im really disorgaised and ive left everything till the last minute, im sure ive forgotten to pack something, i didnt even know where i had to meet in the morning ive emailed about 5 people who are going to find out stuff, i think im going to have to phone Mrs. Dubowski, lol. Today i went to sophies house and we watched Freddy v. Jason, and Cabin fever...again, that film is so good lol. in a weird way. haha. Work was okay yesterday, i got my hair dyed on thursday (blonder) and it was bluey gray bcus the toner kellie put on after was the wrong one..im not sure, and roger shouted at her, and amy dyed half my eyebrow bright blonde accidentally, lol
....

Today was cool, well drama was, were doing the whole jack the ripper thing for moduale two, it going to be really cool, im one of the girls that killed, i have to walk up to craig and say  
"fancy a good time sir? four shillings"
LOL
apperntly thats what whore said in those times, anyway, we were in the boys chaning room (in the dance room, but no boys apart from mat broadhurts who is v. gay does dance so no one was in there)and craig kept turning the light off so we screamed in a childish way, to be stupid, but it was cool, apart from vickie was actually scared, lol. Then me and craig went into town and i sprayed burbury brit all over him, now he smells.
Onfriday i went to daves gig at the mill, it was really good, dave was ignoring me tho, but dallas was being really sweet :) rachael went with me, which was suprising because she would never normally go to anywhere like that..
anywhoo:
im getting my hair dyed and cut on thursday, kellie is going to bleach some of it for me so its going to be more blonder, 
im going to london on monday with drama, should be cool i hope, i wish craig was going but he was too lazy to get a letter :( 

<3 sarah xx

Not updated for a while so here goes..

Last saturday i went to road rage at rock city, it was okay, better than i thourght it would be, i was know as the girl with the sticker on her ass, how the sticker got there im not sure, lol, for some reson everytime i go to city i get really confident and possibly insane. its cool and i love to "mosh" and crowd surf, i dont like sitting on random guys shoulders, or ripping my tights. i lost my phone as well. i was so pissed because i have no ones number, so if anyone wants my number (not that u do) just ask. i saw lots  of people i know that ive not seen for ages like Tom, Dom, Gilmore, Jack, Scott, Jonny, Skeletor, and some other guys whos names i forgot.[[sorry]]
I saw Dave [[from Evoke]] too :) hes pretty, so i went and said hi and proberbly made a huuuge fool out of myself.

Wednesday i went to rileys (snooker place) with school (instead of doing p.e cause in yr 11  you can go swimming etc) it was okay except i cant play pool haha.
anyway...
chelsay and emily kept putting the same song on over and over again on the dukebox, so me and laura looked on the rock section and put on:
marilyn manson-dopeshow
slipknot-spit it out
korn-freak on a leash
and everyone in the pub was like ohmigod....blahblahv=blah  
chelsay was being so mean [[as usual]]
And liam, who i sat next to because he HAD no friends, was saying stuff, like ohmigod she is such a total bitch, i wish they'd turn that fucking shit off, to all his new "popular" friends. then emily pushed past me and said 'oh im so sorry sarah, i didnt mean to do that, how annoying' and the smiled really fakely. 
  I
  Hate 
    Them.

Work was okay, Amy is obsessed with weed, haha, its all she ever talks about, shes like 'fuck it have a  bucket' and 'when somethings wrong have a bong'
LOL, like thats never been said before. Im really glad shes back though, i dont have to do as much or wash as many peoples hair, so its all good.

haha..love sarah xx

Who the hell did I think I was kidding.

Because nothing can ever be 'perfect'.. But who's to say what perfect is.. And who's to tell you no.
And why isnt anyone ever there, to tell you to stop because you are going to fall And how come everyone is always to busy to catch you
but they are always there after the damage?
And how is it possible to feel so many things, to want something so much.. Something that you know just wont be handed to you or even be able to be earned.
And why am I going on about things that are insignificant..
and I sit here draining my mind [or trying to] of everything that is making me hurt. Because tomorrow is a new day. filled with new hurt. new everything.
did I mention, that I miss you?
If it ever mattered...
backtothedrawingboard.

Now im lost The days seem to be dragging on a lot latly and i feel quite depressed, im not sure why as i don't have nything to be depressed about, School was okay, art was good im making sculptures so thats cool. Craigs taken his hair out and he looks like a football manager, but hes shaving all his hair off again tonight, (lol). Im going to rockcity on saturday with vickie, but i don't know what to wear haha,

today was okay, roger was sad tho bcus his boyfriend is cheating on him, and then he shouted at me, and shouted at everyone else and rang people up and had a big hissy fit at them.  im so bored as usual, and tired.meh.

I have blonde hair, no more black! or red, pink, purple etc. just blonde---ish. its a bit like the drummer from tuuli's hair, i think unless shes changed it again. ive not been updating properly for ages, i keep forgetting and when i remember i have nothing interesting to write. my job is going okay, roger and everyone are a bit mean still sometimes, but kerry is really nice to me, and amy gets back off her holiday next week so i won't be on my own anymore!! school is going quite good suprisingly, im still a graphics geek, and mr clapham still fancies me...eeeekk. Sophies started coming to school again :) ive missed her lots, (shes not been at school since year nine,) We watched moulin rouge in drama, its quite good actually haha, better than i thourght but we havnt watched the ending yet, but its pretty obvious whats going to happen. hows your life?

i just saw stef, not to talk to tho he was just passing, we were just like before, everything is okay, infact i feel really great for the first time in ages, like the first time in months. i dont regret what happened with stef, im just happy for him and im happy that we are still friends. i realise now that hes not a god, hes just a boy like all the others, david said that everything happens for a reason even if the reason is the hardest thing to find, i dont know the reason, i doubt i ever will but i know everything will be okay from now on, and i dont need to be scissor happy anymore i can just be happy being myself :)

i love my job!! i keep messing up and amy is pretty much my lifeline at the moment because i don't know how to do anything, she thinks im weird... i washed three peoples hair, made coffee, washed lots of pots and learned how to use a washing machine lol life can't get any better than this, you wouldnt think so anyway. i went to venue gig thing last night, it was ok, scott and joe went, joe was actually being nice for a change *gasps*, i told scott what happened and now i remember why hes my best friend, thankyou scott, and thankyou vickie =D and anyone else who ive told. im trying to forget what happened (even though i know i never will) and move on because nothing will ever come of it, he has the "power" to decide, not me. This is the grace that only we can bestow, This is the price you pay for loss of control. This is the break in the bend. This is the closest of calls. This is the reason you're I'm alone. This is the rise and the fall

"Salt For Your Wounds"

 There's a tear in my heart where the blood ran out. 
 There's a tear in my heart where the love ran out. I thought
 we worked, pushed toward the same ends,
 I'll never be so quick to trust again. 
 Disenchanted, disgusted, I regret that I trusted. 
 I put my faith. 
 My faith in you, you poisoned me through and through.
 I though we both shared the same injuries. 
 Now I've found it's you who injures me. 
 My heart is cracked from being left out in the cold.
 I know you'll pay for what you've taken - tenfold. 
 Disenchanted, disgusted, I regret that I trusted. 
 I put my faith. 
 My faith in them, they twisted the knife further in.

I lay here unfeeling and numb. In the beginning I was heavy and stiff, But now I’m weightless. So what are his thoughts? Ah, yes. He thinks. But not of me. Ever. I don’t mind the unreturned consideration. I’ve grown so used to this lonesomeness that I’m contented in my solitude. At least I tell myself I am relaxed in my loneliness. I tell my mind to deflect the thoughts my empty heart sends up to it. I’m okay. It’s no matter that while I stay awake at night tossing and turning, Disturbed by the mental flashes of his smiles and his words, That he sleeps soundly and dreams of others. It is of no bother to me that while I weep in dark corners gripping my own bloody arms, pulling my own dirty hair, and bathing in my own salty tears, that he sits at home, unknowing and unconcerned. I smile and laugh God, how I adore my brilliant life. I shed tears and scream O, how I carry such disdain for my hideous life. And I beg of God to give me an answer, When will it all be over? I lay here broken and beaten Yes,before, I was unfeeling and numb. Now I am just callous and heartless. My dreams of you are as much nightmares, As they are dreams. I hate you. I am disgusted by you for being you. For being perfect in every sense of the word. I despise you for forcing me to love you… And not even being aware of it. And my dreams are as contradictory as my reality. I’ll make this decision And improve my existence. At least I tell myself I’ll improve my life. I’ll think of him in the same merciless manner That he thinks of me. …As Nothing.

sorry that i have only been putting song lyrics on this recently, but i just feel to numb for words, and im worried that if i write what happened then you with think of it as nothing, because it meant everything to me, even if it was a mistake to him.

What is left of the world
When you can find nothing left of yourself.
Crying to sleep never was in option 
In a wade pool of emotions.
The ground is sinking
But before your eyes-
The illusion disappears.
A pathetic statement of resolution
I wait,
Painting a detailed portrait
Of my sanity against the wall.
blinking,
the darkness doesn’t 
Fade away
This feeling.
I am lost between 
my dreams
and the encrusted eyelashes
that ties me inside them.
wash me away
like the waves on the ocean,
scatter nightmares
collecting at my feet
watching the sand
capture each inch of skin.

Watching the water
I can’t find a mirror inside me
inside anything.

What is left
Inside yourself?
